item.title: No Limits - Huntress CTF 2025 PWN Challenge Writeup
item.author: sir_xxxx@protonmail.com (XeroExecute Blog)
item.description: Complete writeup for “No Limits” PWN challenge from Huntress CTF 2025. Exploit a parent-child process architecture to bypass seccomp restrictions using /proc/pid/mem and GOT hijacking techniques.
